root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 13-3-1, translated into en
root.data:
Data availability:

During the last consultation on the implementation of the 1974 Recommendation concerning Education for International Understanding, Co-operation and Peace and Education relating to Human Rights and Fundamental Freedoms carried out in 2020-2021, 74 countries provided reports: Central and Southern Asia (4), Eastern and South-Eastern Asia (6), Europe and Northern America (32), Latin America and the Caribbean (10), Northern Africa and Western Asia (14), Oceania (2), and sub-Saharan Africa (6).

Time series:

The first data will be available for the time period 2017-2020 (as a single time point)..

Disaggregation:

None.
